Body:
s = spectrographs.keck_nirspec.KeckNIRSPECSpectrograph()
example_file = os.path.join(os.environ['PYPEIT_DEV'], 'RAW_DATA',
    'keck_nirspec', 'LOW_NIRSPEC-1', 'NS.20160414.02637.fits.gz')
assert os.path.isfile(example_file
    ), 'Could not find example file for Keck NIRSPEC read.'
det = 1
_, data, hdu, exptime, rawdatasec_img, oscansec_img = s.get_rawimage(
    example_file, det)
bpm = s.bpm(example_file, det)
assert data.shape == bpm.shape, 'Image and BPM have different shapes!'
dev_suite_required
